name: Onii-chan Asobo
detailed_description:
Genres: Kinetic Novel, Ecchi, Slice of Life, Romance.

Koichi Akiyama, an ordinary 22-year-old game developer, has been living a boring life until one day his younger sister Ai paid him a visit.
Soon after Ai moves in with Koichi, she claims that she wants to become a game developer too, so her brother has to teach her everything he knows.
The only problem is that Ai wants to create Hentai games, which puts Koichi in a dubious position.
From now on these two need to learn how to work together and explore all the difficulties of writing Hentai stories.


  • HD 1080p window & full screen options
  • 50+ Beautifully illustrated CGs
  • Minigames
  • Original Soundtrack

Genres: Kinetic Novel, Ecchi, Slice of Life, Romance.

short_description: "Let's play Onii-chan" is a Slice of Life/Ecchi Kinetic Novel about a developer of AO-rated games and his younger sister, who wants to become a developer too and intends to learn by doing things.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8(8.1)/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu/SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound

content_descriptors.notes:
All the characters in "Onii-chan Asobo" are over 18 years old.

Mature content intended for adults only: scenes of sexual nature and consensual sex. The text contains scenes of sexual nature and detailed consensual sex descriptions.
